correctness.rationale: Processes (pO, W, WpO) and key reactants/conditions (Zn(Cppm)2, O2 plasma/H2O, 200 °C, Ar purge, 100 W for plasma steps) are correctly identified. However, there are multiple factual and schema issues: (1) Growth-per-cycle values are off by 10× due to unit mismatch—article reports 0.13/0.07/0.10 nm/cycle but JSON uses 0.13/0.07/0.10 Å; should be 1.3/0.7/1.0 Å. (2) Dosing and purge times are reported in seconds in the article (e.g., 16 s, 50 s, 15 s), but JSON encodes them with unit MilliSEC and numeric values 16/50/15; these must be 16000/50000/15000 ms (WpO also missing the 8 s O2 plasma co-reactant dose). (3) Film thickness vs number of cycles is inconsistent and not traceable: 28.3/24.6/27.7 nm correspond to 200/350/270 cycles (TEM) in the article, not 30 cycles as encoded; either cycles or thickness must be corrected. (4) Many parameters are invented/not reported: reactor pressure (50 mmHg), all flow rates, uniformity, conformality, roughness, refractive index/absorption, electrical transport (resistivity, carrier density, mobility), TFT device metrics, and on/off ratio. These should be removed or left unspecified because the article provides no such values. (5) Film density is misreported: article gives ~5.2–5.1 g/cm3; JSON uses 5.2 g/dm3 with method ‘ellipsometry’—unit should be converted (≈5200 g/dm3 if using gm/DeciM3) and method aligned to HR-RBS + thickness. (6) W process sets plasmaPower to null—schema expects an object; omit the field instead. (7) thicknessControl structure deviates from schema by nesting numberofCycles and filmThickness inside growthPerCycle; they should be sibling properties of thicknessControl. (8) Safety claim ‘non-pyrophoric’ is not explicitly stated in the article; only thermal stability and low vapor pressure are reported. To correct: fix GPC units/values; convert all times to ms (or change unit to seconds if schema allows); align cycles and thickness with the article; remove unreported flow/pressure/material/device metrics; correct film density units/method; omit plasmaPower in TALD; fix thicknessControl structure; include the 8 s O2 plasma dose in WpO dosing.

completeness.rationale: Major incompleteness and multiple factual and schema issues. While all three ZnO ALD processes (O2 plasma, H2O, H2O→O2 plasma) are present, many parameters are incorrect, fabricated, or not traceable to the article and some violate the schema. Key issues: (1) Growth-per-cycle values use the wrong magnitude and unit: article reports 0.13/0.07/0.10 nm per cycle (≈1.3/0.7/1.0 Å), but extraction lists 0.13/0.07/0.10 Å, 10× too small. (2) Thickness vs number of cycles mismatch: film thickness values (28.3/24.6/27.7 nm) correspond to ~200/350/270 cycles in TEM examples, not the 30 cycles recorded in thicknessControl. (3) Dosing and purge times use milliseconds unit but seconds values (e.g., 16 s, 50 s, 15 s in article) are entered as 16, 50, 15 ms—1000× off; additionally, the WpO process lacks a separate O2 plasma co-reactant dose (8 s) in dosingTime. (4) Pressure and all flow rates are invented; the article provides none for deposition (only a 50 Pa value for precursor distillation). (5) Material and device properties are largely fabricated: refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap (with Tauc plot), electrical properties, AFM roughness, uniformity, conformality, and all TFT device metrics are not reported in the article. (6) Film density values are reported in the article (~5.1–5.2 g/cm3) but the method is misattributed to ellipsometry; the article derives density from HR-RBS areal density and thickness. (7) Film composition: atomic ratio ~1:1 is supported, but “50%” elemental concentrations are not reported. (8) Schema violation: plasmaPower is set to null for the thermal (H2O) process; the schema expects an object if present. (9) Minor but relevant: purge time after each reactant is 15 s in article, but entered as 15 ms; delivery method and plasma power are correct; substrate and temperature align. To improve, correct units/magnitudes (GPC, times), align cycles with thickness, remove fabricated parameters (pressure, flows, optical/electrical/device/AFM/uniformity/conformality), add the WpO O2 plasma dose time, and fix plasmaPower null to conform to the schema.
